mapper.insert: insert into j_subject (j_no, j_subject_name, j_sub_prof, j_semester, j_grade, j_is_passed, j_t_code, j_score, j_outline, j_reference, j_progress) values (j_subject_seq.nextval, #{subjectName}, #{professor}, #{Semester.select}, #{grade}, #{inPassed}, #{SiteMap.code}, #{score}, #{outline}, #{reference},#{progress})
mapper.select: select j_no as no, j_subject_name as subjectName, j_sub_prof as professor, j_semester as "select", j_grade as grade, j_is_passed as isPassed, j_t_code as siteCode, j_score as score, j_outline as outline, j_reference as "reference", j_progress as progress from j_subject
